channel.title: Linux Auto Updater v1.2 (without perl)
channel.description:
Unfortunetly this requires the jdk installed - javac/java/jar searches for its classes in a root document. :(
Allright - Aryan auto updater, moparisthebest's version ported to linux. "Preloaded" with version 376. I can not stress this enough - this is for LINUX. The holy grail of computing, freeing you from the shackles of software licenses and welcoming you into the free world of open source - you get the drift.
See: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1529.0.html for moparisthebest's windows copy and original
Instructions: cd into the directory ./Update-Aryan.sh Go to sleep/ whatever aprox. 15 mins cd Aryan ./compile-all.sh ./run-bot.sh Laugh + continue Autoing!
For version 376: ./compile-all.sh ./Aryan/run-bot.sh Laugh + continue Autoing!
Enjoy!
Download http://www.filefactory.com/?46ea24 (Those who do not like fiilefactory - post the sites that are better, but not the link for the updater itself)

item.title: Linux Auto Updater v1.2 (without perl)
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Unfortunetly this requires the jdk installed - javac/java/jar searches for its classes in a root document.

Allright - Aryan auto updater, moparisthebest’s version ported to linux. “Preloaded” with version 376. I can not stress this enough - this is for LINUX. The holy grail of computing, freeing you from the shackles of software licenses and welcoming you into the free world of open source - you get the drift.

See: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1529.0.html for moparisthebest’s windows copy and original

Instructions:
cd into the directory
./Update-Aryan.sh
Go to sleep/ whatever aprox. 15 mins
cd Aryan
./compile-all.sh
./run-bot.sh
Laugh + continue Autoing!

For version 376:
./compile-all.sh
./Aryan/run-bot.sh
Laugh + continue Autoing!

Enjoy!

Download http://www.filefactory.com/?46ea24
(Those who do not like fiilefactory - post the sites that are better, but not the link for the updater itself)

Read full topic
